lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Fred Gibson/Ed Sheeran/Justin Bieber/Jason Boyd/Max Martin/Shellback
[00:01.000] 作词 : Ed Sheeran/Fred Gibson/Jason Boyd/Justin Bieber/Max Martin/Shellback
[00:05.887]I’m at a party I don’t wanna be at
[00:07.805]And I don’t ever wear a suit and tie
[00:10.192]Wondering if I can sneak out of the back
[00:12.519]Nobody is even looking at me in my eyes
[00:14.904]And then you take my hand, finish my drink, say shall we dance (hell yeah)
[00:19.587]Y’know I love you did I ever tell you, you make it better like that
[00:23.570]
[00:24.220]Don’t think I fit in at this party
[00:28.471]Everyone’s got so much to say
[00:33.170]I always feel like I’m nobody
[00:38.137]Who wants to fit in anyway
[00:40.705]
[00:42.037]Coz I don’t care when I’m with my baby yeah
[00:45.487]All the bad things disappear
[00:47.887]And you making me feel that maybe I am somebody
[00:52.320]I can deal with the bad nights when I’m with my baby yeah (ooh, ooh, ooh)
[01:00.621]Coz I don’t care
[01:02.336]As long as you just hold me near
[01:04.237]You can take me anywhere and you making me feel like I’m loved by somebody
[01:11.220]I can deal with the bad nights when I’m with my baby yeah
[01:16.304]
[01:20.886]We at a party we don’t wanna be at
[01:23.189]Trying to talk but we can’t hear ourselves
[01:25.604]Read your lips I’d rather kiss ‘em right back
[01:27.820]With all these people all around, I’m crippled with anxiety
[01:31.570]But I’m told its where I’m supposed to be
[01:34.171]You know what? It’s kind of crazy coz I really don’t mind
[01:37.237]When you make it better like that
[01:38.805]
[01:39.520]Don’t think I fit in at this party
[01:43.690]Everyone’s got so much to say
[01:48.404]When we walked in I said I’m sorry
[01:53.520]But now I think that we should stay
[01:56.269]
[01:56.808]Coz I don’t care when I’m with my baby yeah
[02:00.670]All the bad things disappear
[02:03.137]And you making me feel that maybe I am somebody
[02:07.404]I can deal with the bad nights when I’m with my baby yeah (ooh, ooh, ooh, oh yeah yeah yeah)
[02:16.137]Coz I don’t care, as long as you just hold me near
[02:19.621]You can take me anywhere and you making me feel like I’m loved by somebody
[02:26.354]I can deal with the bad nights when I’m with my baby yeah (oh oh oh oh, no)
[02:34.838]
[02:35.405]I don’t like ‘bout nobody but you
[02:38.208]It’s like you’re the only one here
[02:40.273]I don’t like ‘bout nobody but you baby I don’t care
[02:44.957]I don’t like ‘bout nobody but you
[02:47.387]I hate everyone here
[02:49.570]I don’t like ‘bout nobody but you baby yeah
[02:53.554]
[02:53.805]Coz I don’t care (don’t care) when I’m with my baby yeah (oh yeah)
[02:57.191]All the bad things disappear (disappear)
[02:59.604]And you making me feel that maybe I am somebody (maybe I’m somebody)
[03:04.238]I can deal with the bad nights (with the bad nights) when I’m with my baby yeah (ooh, ooh, ooh, oh yeah yeah yeah)
[03:12.322]Coz I don’t care, as long as you just hold me near (me near)
[03:16.222]You can take me anywhere (anywhere, anywhere) and you making me feel like I’m loved by somebody (loved by somebody yeah)
[03:22.871]I can deal with the bad nights when I’m with my baby yeah (oh oh oh oh, no)
[03:31.188]
tlyric:
[by:弋许]
[00:05.887]我参加了一个我不想参加的聚会
[00:07.805]我从不穿西装打领带扮演高贵绅士
[00:10.192]真想知道能不能从后面溜出去
[00:12.519]甚至没有人注意我
[00:14.904]你能握住我的手吗 帮我喝了这杯酒 说 我们跳舞好吗
[00:19.587]你知道我爱你 我告诉过你吗 你让事情变得美好
[00:24.220]我和这个派对格格不入
[00:28.471]在场的每个人都谈笑风生
[00:33.170]我总是觉得自己是个无名小卒
[00:38.137]谁又想和我为伍呢
[00:42.037]当我和宝贝你在一起时 什么都无所谓了
[00:45.487]所有糟糕的事都消失不见
[00:47.887]你让我觉得 自己是闪闪发光的人物
[00:52.320]当我和宝贝你在一起时 我可以熬过孤寂无助的夜晚
[01:00.621]我什么都不在乎
[01:02.336]只要你抱紧我
[01:04.237]你可以带我去天涯海角 你让我觉得自己被深爱着
[01:11.220]当我和宝贝你在一起时 我可以熬过孤寂无助的夜晚
[01:20.886]参加了不想参加的派对
[01:23.189]我们试着交谈 嘈杂的背景音让我们听不到彼此的声音
[01:25.604]我的指按上你的双唇 恨不得马上和你唇齿缠绵
[01:27.820]周围都是碍事的人 真是焦虑得要命
[01:31.570]但有人说 我就应该安分待在这
[01:34.171]你知道吗 我的举动有些疯狂 但我毫无顾忌
[01:37.237]你让事情变得美好
[01:39.520]我和这个派对格格不入
[01:43.690]在场的每个人都谈笑风生
[01:48.404]当我们走进人群 我说 抱歉 告辞
[01:53.520]但现在 我觉得我们该留下
[01:56.808]当我和宝贝你在一起时 什么都无所谓了
[02:00.670]所有糟糕的事都消失不见
[02:03.137]你让我觉得 自己是闪闪发光的人物
[02:07.404]当我和宝贝你在一起时 我可以熬过孤寂无助的夜晚
[02:16.137]因为只要你抱紧我 我什么都无所谓了
[02:19.621]你可以带我去天涯海角 你让我觉得自己被深爱着
[02:26.354]当我和宝贝你在一起时 我可以熬过孤寂无助的夜晚
[02:35.405]我只喜欢你
[02:38.208]你在这无可替代
[02:40.273]我只喜欢你
[02:44.957]我只喜欢你
[02:47.387]我厌恶这里的每一个人
[02:49.570]但我喜欢你
[02:53.805]当我和宝贝你在一起时 什么都无所谓了
[02:57.191]所有糟糕的事都消失不见
[02:59.604]你让我觉得 自己是闪闪发光的人物
[03:04.238]当我和宝贝你在一起时 我可以熬过孤寂无助的夜晚
[03:12.322]因为只要你抱紧我 我什么都无所谓了
[03:16.222]你可以带我去天涯海角 你让我觉得自己被深爱着
[03:22.871]当我和宝贝你在一起时 我可以熬过孤寂无助的夜晚
